images.copyright: Two young male polar bears, Churchill, Manitoba, Canada (© Cheryl Ramalho/Getty Images)
images.title: A Festivus for the fuzziest of us
images.caption: Festivus
images.desc: For polar bears, the airing of grievances is a feat of strength in itself. These big fellas are frequent sights here in Churchill, Manitoba, where hundreds of bears converge in the winter to hunt, but we're still calling this light-bathed snapshot a Festivus miracle!
images.bsTitle: A Festivus for the fuzziest of us
